Key Match Events: LeBron James and Christie combined for 11 points down the stretch, capped by James' seventh 3-pointer with 59 seconds left.
Pre-Game Insights: Anthony Davis sat out for only the second time this season to rest his sprained left ankle, which he hurt on Christmas.
Gabe Vincent also sat with a hip injury.
Post-Match Reflections: The first and fourth quarters were promising, but they waited too long to get aggressive in the opener of a five-game road trip after going 3-9 in December.
Christie is emerging as a key contributor in his third season. He has scored in double digits for the fourth time in five games, providing 3-and-D excellence.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Davis sat out for only the second time this season to rest his sprained left ankle, which he hurt on Christmas.
Gabe Vincent also sat with a hip injury.
